item.title: English Kids Song - Monster Pizza
item.description:
We love
monster pizza
Tomato sauce ham
pepperoni onion
Green pepper paprika
cheese magic seasoning
What’s that?
smells great
In the oven
can’t wait
Mom’s cooking
we’re helping
We’re gonna eat
monster pizza
Vegetables
and meat-za
Lots of yummy
cheese-za
Just wanna sing
and dance
And eat
monster pizza
Tomato sauce ham
pepperoni onion
Green pepper paprika
cheese magic seasoning

smells great

can’t wait

we’re helping
We’re gonna eat
monster pizza
Vegetables
and meat-za
Lots of yummy
cheese-za

and dance
And eat

item.title: English Kids Song - Healthy Promises
item.description:
Hey do you make
healthy promises?
Do you promise
everyday
To take care
of your health?
You should make
the healthy promises
To take care
of yourself
If you’re healthy
and you know it
Then you really
feel good
Love yourself
with healthy promises
Wash your hands
before you eat
And brush your teeth
right after
Eat well
everyday
And drink
a lot of water
See your dentist
twice a year
And your family
doctor
Exercise
and get your rest
And don’t forget
the laughter
Healthy promises
healthy promises
Healthy promises
healthy promises
Make your
healthy promises

item.title: English Kids Song - I Wish
item.description:
My friends
I want to sing
This song
for you
To make
the flowers dance
To make
the birds fly high
To make
everybody happy
La la la la
la la la la la la la
La la la la
la la la la
If I could sing
like an angel
I wish I could sing
like an angel
An angel
for just one day
I would sing the world
a pretty song
Make us happy
all day long
If I could sing
like an angel
Sing and make
the flowers dance
Sing and make
the birds fly
High up
in the sky
I wish I wish
oh why can’t I
If I could sing
like an angel
Sing and show you
the way
I could make
the whole world happy
I want to make
the whole world happy
If I could make
the whole world happy
For just one day
just one day

item.title: English Kids Song - Let's Go On A Trip
item.description:
Let’s go on a trip
around the world
Let’s go on a trip
around the world
Around the world
let’s go on a trip
Where do you
want to go?
(To Egypt)
I want to go to Egypt
How’s the weather
in Egypt today?
It’s sunny and hot
better pack
Some sunscreen
and a big hat
Let’s go
to Egypt
To where
it’s sunny and hot
Better pack
the sunscreen
And a big
old hat
Let’s go on a trip
around the world
Around the world
let’s go on a trip
Where do you want
to go?(to Finland)
I want to go
to Finland
How’s the weather
in Finland today?
It’s snowy
and cold
Better pack
a warm scarf
And
a winter coat
Let’s go
to Finland
To where

Better pack
a warm scarf
And
a winter coat

(To

I want to go
to the Philippines

And
some rubber boots
Let’s go

To where

Better pack

better pack

Let’s go

To where

Where do you

item.title: English Kids Song - Magic Seasons
item.description:
Magic
seasons
Spring magic spring
the leaves are green
The flowers bloom
it’s spring
Let’s go see
the baby birds
learn to fly and sing
magic spring
Summer magic summer
the sun is hot
The water’s warm
it’s summer
Let’s go to the beach
and play in the sand
And swim in the water
magic summer
Seasons
magic seasons
A brand-new
smiling
World
with each new season
Let’s wake up
and smile
Their magic
magic seasons
Fall magic fall
the air is fresh
The leaves change
color it’s fall
Let’s go for a picnic
by the river
Or a hike in the
mountains magic fall
Winter magic winter
the earth sleeps
The snow falls
it’s winter
Let’s go have
a snowball fight
Or make
a snowman
Or skate on the frozen
river magic winter
Seasons
magic seasons
A brand-new
smiling
World
with each new season
Let’s wake up
and smile
Their magic
magic seasons
Magic seasons
magic seasons
Magic
seasons

are you ready

a song

a tree

greener

laugh

together

If we make the world

your turn

item.title: English Kids Song - Beebusters
item.description:
No bee shall be free
beebusters
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
If there’s a buzz
don’t make a fuss
Just call us
beebusters
We’re not afraid
of the sound they make
Give us a buzz
beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
In the cup
on my nose
Under the bench
beebusters
In front of
the house
Behind the tree
beside me beebusters
Between you
and your friend
Don’t bee
afraid
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
Come on
wherever there’s a bee
We’ll catch it
beebusters
